outputs.output_descr: To support widened implementation of fiscal reforms as well as to address emerging policy development and other capacity needs , emphasing poverty reduction issues. It focuses on addressing human capacity and institutional needs  at sub-national level, esp. in less-developed regions based on previous program experience in public expenditure management and taxation. It also supports development of pro-poor fiscal policy intiatives.

project_descr: Capacity Building to Support Fiscal Reform in China
project_title: Capacity Building to Support Fiscal Reform in China
